meanings.sent1: A picogram is a very tiny amount of weight.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use picograms to measure extremely small masses.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled a picogram of sugar in my coffee!
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as light as a picogram, barely audible in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The picogram of dust on the shelf sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A unit of mass equal to one trillionth of a gram.
meanings.sent1: The lab equipment can accurately measure a picogram of substance.
meanings.sent2: Pharmaceutical companies often work with picograms of active ingredients.
meanings.sent3: I found a picogram of flour stuck to the measuring spoon.
meanings.sent4: The impact of her words weighed only a picogram in the grand scheme of things.
meanings.sent5: The picogram of salt dissolved instantly in the pot of boiling water.
